ChineseHoroscopePage.findYourSignTitle: Discover your Chinese sign and element
ChineseHoroscopePage.calculationNote: Note: This calculation is based on the Gregorian year. The Chinese New Year varies, so if you were born in January or February, your sign could differ.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Rabbit: Kind, quiet, elegant and alert; fast and skilled.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Dragon: Confident, intelligent, enthusiastic and a born leader.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Horse: Vivacious, active, energetic and loves to be among the crowd.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Goat: Of good manners, shy, stable, understanding and friendly.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Rooste: Observer, worker, ingenious, brave and talented.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Dog: Loyal, honest, kind, kind, cautious and prudent.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Pig: Diligent, compassionate, generous and easy treatment.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Rat.interpretatio: Rats are known for their charm and intelligence. They are natural opportunists with an incredible capacity to adapt to new situations. Their curiosity has no limits and are always looking for ways to improve their life and that of those around them. Although they can be a bit tacañas, they are extremely loyal to their friends and family. Their fast mind and their sociable nature make them excellent strategists and problem solving.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Ox.interpretation: The ox symbolizes strength, diligence and reliability. They are tireless workers who believe in the power of patience and perseverance. Their methodical approach of life allows them to build solid and lasting bases. Although they can be third and reluctant to change, their loyalty and their sense of duty are unwavering. An ox is a friend and a partner you can always trust.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Tiger.interpretat: The tiger is the epitome of courage, charisma and trust. They are natural leaders with a magnetic energy that attracts others. They live life with passion and intensity, and do not fear taking risks to reach their goals. Their unpredictable nature makes them exciting, but they can also be impulsive and temperamental. A tiger will always defend what he believes fair and will protect his loved ones fiercely.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Rabbit.interpreta: Rabbit is a symbol of peace, elegance and sensitivity. They are gentle souls that yearn for a harmonious environment and avoid conflict at all costs. Their diplomatic nature and good taste make them excellent hosts and friends. Although they may seem shy, they are extremely vigilant and cunning, capable of raising the danger with grace. His greatest strength is his ability to create beauty and tranquility around him.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Dragon.interpreta: The dragon is the most powerful and auspicious sign of Chinese zodiac. They are charismatic visionaries, full of energy, ambition and an innate desire to lead. His self -confidence is immense and they don't fear challenges. Sometimes they may seem arrogant, but their heart is generous and are always willing to help others. A dragon is destined to leave a mark on the world.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Snake.interpretat: The snake is wise, enigmatic and deeply intuitive. They have an acute mind and a calm that hides a great inner strength. They are excellent strategists who prefer to work in silence, analyzing situations from all angles before acting. Although they can be reserved and distrustful, they are extremely loyal and possessive with the people who love. His wisdom and his magnetic charm are his greatest gifts.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Horse.interpretat: The horse is a free spirit, full of energy, optimism and an insatiable love for adventure. They are extremely sociable and love to be in the center of the action. Their independence is their most precious good, and hate feeling tied or restricted. Although their impulsive nature can lead them to make precipitated decisions, their enthusiasm is contagious and their ability to recover from setbacks is admirable.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Goat.interpretati: The goat is the artist of the Chinese Zodiac, a kind, creative and compassionate soul. They are dreamers who value beauty, peace and harmony above all. Their sensitive nature makes them very empathic, but also prone to melancholy and indecision. They need a stable and support environment for their creativity to bloom. A goat is a loyal friend and a comprehensive partner.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Monkey.interpreta: The monkey is the naughty genius of Zodiac. They are incredibly intelligent, ingenious and curious, with an unmatched ability to solve complex problems in creative forms. Their sense of humor and their love for fun make them the soul of any social meeting. The challenge for the monkey is to channel its mental energy so as not to get bored or become too manipulative. Its greatest asset is its ability to innovate and adapt to any situation.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Rooster.interpret: The rooster is the perfectionist of the Zodiac, observer, worker and with a great sense of duty. They are extremely organized and have an acute eye for details, which makes them excellent planners. His honesty is direct and sometimes brutal, since they believe in telling the truth to improve things. Although they may seem arrogant, they are deeply loyal and are always willing to work hard for the good of their family and community.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Dog.interpretatio: The dog is the loyal and honest guard of the zodiac. His sense of justice and his loyalty are absolute. They are friends and colleagues who can be trusted blindly, always ready to defend the weak and fight for what is correct. Its nature can sometimes be pessimistic or anxious, since they tend to worry about others. A dog is the most faithful partner that can be desired.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Pig.interpretatio: Pork is a symbol of generosity, honesty and good fortune. They are souls of good heart that enjoy the simple pleasures of life and work hard to provide their loved ones. Their confident nature and lack of pretensions make them loved by all. Although sometimes they can be a bit naive, his heart is pure and his optimism is unwavering. A pig in your life is a constant source of joy and unconditional support.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome Astromistics. His privacy is of the utmost importance to us. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, disseminate and protect your information when you use our application. The changes will immediately enter into force after the publication of the updated policy, and we encourage you to review it periodically.

informationWeCollect.title: 2. Information we collect
informationWeCollect.content: ** Personal data: ** We collect the information that you voluntarily provide us, such as name, email and birth data (date, time, place), to create custom astrological readings. \ N \ n ** Interactions with the application, such as the use of fault functions and reports, to improve our services.

howWeUseInformation.title: 3. How we use your information
howWeUseInformation.content: Your information is used to: \ n- customize and manage your account. \ N- Provide precise astrological reports (horoscopes, natal letters).

dataSharing.title: 4. Share data with third parties
dataSharing.content: We share your information with external suppliers that help us provide and improve our services, such as: \ n- ** Firebase (Google): ** For authentication, database management and analysis. \ N- ** Google Admob: ** To serve personalized ads. We do not sell your personal information.

advertising.title: 5. Advertising and Admob
advertising.content: We use Google Admob to show ads in the application. Admob is an advertising service provided by Google. Admob can use device identifiers to display personalized ads. We do not share your identifiable personal information as a name or email directly with ADMOB for this purpose. You can manage your advertisement preferences in your mobile device settings.

dataSecurity.title: 6. Data security
dataSecurity.content: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access. However, no security measure is 100% safe and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data.

yourRights.title: 7. Your rights and control
yourRights.content: You have the right to access and update your personal information. You can review and change your birth information and the details of your profile at any time in the profile and incorporation sections of the application. To delete your account or for other applications related to privacy, please contact us below.

childrensPrivacy.title: 8. Children's privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Our services are not aimed at children under 13. We do not know to knowing children's personal identification information. If we realize that a child has provided us with personal data, we will eliminate them immediately.

changesToPolicy.title: 9. Changes to this policy
changesToPolicy.content: We can update our privacy policy from time to time. We will notify any change by publishing the new privacy policy on this page.

contactUs.title: 10. Contact us
contactUs.description: If you have questions about your privacy or data management, you can contact us:

deleteRequest.title: Eliminate my account and data
deleteRequest.description: Request the complete elimination of your account and all the associated data.

reasonOptions.no_longer_using: I no longer use the application

deleteRequest.additionalInfoPlaceholder: Provide more details if you wish ...
deleteRequest.warning: Warning: This action will permanently eliminate your account and all associated data. This process cannot be undone. We will process your application within 30 days.

toast.requestSentDescription: Your elimination application has been received. We will get in touch with you within 30 days.
toast.errorDescription: The application could not be sent. Please try again.

MayanHoroscopePage.title: Mayan horoscope
MayanHoroscopePage.subtitle: Discover the old perspectives of Mayan astrology.
MayanHoroscopePage.discoverKinSubtitle: Find your galactic sign and tone
MayanHoroscopePage.comingSoon: More Mayan tools and calculations soon!
MayanHoroscopePage.question: Essential question:
MayanHoroscopePage.kinCalculatorDescript: The Maya Kin is a unit of time and energy in the Tzolkin (Sacred Mayan calendar). Represents your personal galactic firm, combining the energy of a solar stamp and a galactic tone, offering perspectives on your purpose and way of life.
MayanHoroscopePage.selectDatePrompt: Select your birth date to discover your Maya Kin.
MayanHoroscopePage.errorCalculatingKin: Error when calculating your Kin. Please check the date and try again.
MayanHoroscopePage.showCalculationExplan: See how your kin is calculated
MayanHoroscopePage.calculationExplanatio: Explanation of the calculation of your Maya Kin
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep1: Base Date: It is used on July 26, 1987 (Kin 1: 1 Imix - Magnetic Dragon) as a starting point in the Dreamspell account.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep2: Speed days: We calculate the total number of days between the base date and your date of birth.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep3: Kin number: Using Module 260 (Total Kines in the Tzolkin), we get your Kin number (1-260). Simplified formula: Kin = ((days from the end of the base - 1) % 260 + 260) % 260 + 1.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep4: Solar seal (Nahual): It is derived from the Kin number using module 20: (Kin - 1) % 20.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep5: Galactic tone: It is derived from the Kin number using module 13: (Kin - 1) % 13.
MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainNote: This is a modern interpretation (Dreamspell) of the Mayan Tzolkin. There are other traditional accounts.

MayanSign.Imix.description: The source of life, the primary livelihood.
MayanSign.Ik.description: The breath of spirit, communication and truth.
MayanSign.Akbal.description: The sanctuary, the trip in and the time of sleep.
MayanSign.Kan.description: The potential, growth and focused consciousness.
MayanSign.Chicchan.description: The vital force, instinct and connection with the body.
MayanSign.Muluc.description: Universal water, purified emotions and flow.
MayanSign.Chuen.description: The game, magic and divine illusion.
MayanSign.Eb.description: Free will, human influence and abundance.
MayanSign.Ben.description: The pillar of heaven and earth, connection and time-time trip.
MayanSign.Men.description: Collective vision, upper mind and consciousness.
MayanSign.Cib.description: Cosmic wisdom, forgiveness and inner voice.
MayanSign.Imix.interpretation: IMIX represents the primordial birth, energy and confidence in the provision of the universe. It is the cosmic uterus, the origin of all things. Those born under this seal are last initiators, suppliers and protectors with a strong survival instinct. His energy is raw, powerful and often manifested as a torrent of ideas and potential. They are often seen as the pillars of their families and communities, offering nutrition and security. His greatest challenge is to learn to trust the abundant flow of life, releasing control and overcoming fears of scarcity or abandonment. Imix's energy invites you to connect with the source of all creation, to honor your basic needs and to have faith in which the universe will always provide. It is a call to embrace your creative power and give birth to new beginnings.
MayanSign.Ik.interpretation: IK is the vital breath, the invisible spirit that encourages all creation. It is the energy of communication, truth and inspiration. IK people are born communicators, quick thinkers with an agile mind that often have a gift for language, writing and spoken word. They are versatile, adaptable and can change direction with the same ease as the wind, which makes them excellent in multitasking and problem solving. His greatest challenge is to learn to focus his mental energy and stay anchored, since his tendency to dispersion can prevent his multiple ideas from materializing. IK's energy encourages you to tell your truth clearly, to breathe deeply to connect with your center and allow the spirit of life to move through you, carrying and bringing important messages.
MayanSign.Akbal.interpretation: Akbal is the seal of the night, the sanctuary of the home and the vast world of dreams. It represents deep introspection, intuition and brave journey to the darkness of the subconscious to find the light of inner truth. Those who are under the Akbal seal are often deep, mysterious and have a rich inner life. They feel comfortable in silence and stillness, where they can explore their mental labyrinths. His greatest challenge is not to miss in his own thoughts or fears, learning to balance introspection with action in the outside world. His task is to bring to light the treasures from his inner world. Akbal invites you to explore your dreams, confront your shadows and find the security and abundance that reside inside you, in your own inner temple.
MayanSign.Kan.interpretation: Kan symbolizes the seed, the immense potential contained in a tiny point and the explosive energy of growth. It represents the opportunity to bloom, manifest talents and achieve self -development. Kan people are dynamic, energetic, full of ideas and have an innate desire to evolve and expand. They are natural leaders who inspire others to achieve their maximum potential, acting as change catalysts. His biggest challenge lies in cultivating patience, understanding that all growth has its own rhythm. They must learn to trust the natural process without forcing the results, avoiding the frustration of instant non -instant gratification. Kan encourages you to plant the seeds of your intentions with a clear approach, to take care of them with consciousness and dedication, and to trust that, at the right time, you will reap the fruits of your efforts.
MayanSign.Chicchan.interpretation: Chicchan is the snake, the symbol of the vital force (Kundalini), the pure instinct and the deep connection with the intelligence of the physical body. It is the raw energy of survival, passion, sexuality and primordial wisdom that resides in our DNA. Chicchan people are charismatic, intense and have a magnetic presence that does not go unnoticed. Guided by their instincts, they have an incredible capacity for transformation and regeneration, moving the skin to be stronger. His challenge is to learn to balance his powerful instinctive energy with the wisdom of the heart, avoiding falling into purely primary reactions. Chicchan invites you to honor your body as a sacred temple, to listen carefully to your instincts, to embrace your passion for life and use your vital energy to heal and transform.
MayanSign.Cimi.interpretation: Cimi is the seal of death and transformation. It represents the ability to release the old to give way to the new, the surrender and the bridge between worlds. Far from being a negative sign, Cimi is a sign of great opportunity for renewal. Those born under the Cimi seal are often wise, understanding and have a unique perspective on life cycles. They understand that each final is a new beginning. His challenge is not to fear change and learn to surrender to the natural flow of life without resistance. Cimi encourages you to forgive, to free what is no longer useful, to strip you of old identities and embrace the release of transformation as an essential part of evolution.
MayanSign.Manik.interpretation: Manik is the hand, symbolizing healing, realization and knowledge. It is the energy of concrete action, tools and completion. Manik people are often skilled, practical and have a natural gift for healing, whether physical, emotional or spiritual. They are solucing problems that enjoy rolling up and doing things. They are generous and find satisfaction in helping others. His challenge is to learn to receive as much as they give and avoid perfectionism. Manik invites you to use your hands to create, to heal, to share what you have learned with others and to complete what you have begun, turning your visions into tangible reality.
MayanSign.Lamat.interpretation: Lamat is the star, representing beauty, harmony and elegance. It is the energy that connects us with the harmony of the cosmos and reminds us of our own inner light. Lamat people are often artistic, sociable and have a deep sense of aesthetics. They seek to create harmony and beauty in their environment and in their relationships. They have a natural brilliance that attracts others. His challenge is not to miss in superficiality or in the need for external validation, and learn to find beauty also in imperfection. Lamat invites you to let your own light shine, to embrace creativity as a form of service and find harmony in all things.
MayanSign.Muluc.interpretation: Muluc is water, representing primary emotions, purification and flow of life. It is the seal of the moon and awareness. Muluc people are very intuitive, empathic and emotionally deep. They are like antennas, capturing the feelings of those around them. They have a strong connection with the divine feminine and the cycles of nature. His challenge is to learn to navigate their own emotional currents without drowning in them or those of others. Muluc invites you to honor your emotions, to purify your heart of old wounds, to trust your intuition and flow with life instead of fighting it.
MayanSign.Oc.interpretation: OC is the dog, the symbol of loyalty, unconditional love and relationships. It is the energy of the heart, friendship, family and guide. OC people are loyal, protective, trusted and deeply committed partners with their loved ones. They deeply value their relationships and often act as guides or guardians for others, offering emotional support and a safe port. His challenge is to overcome the fear of abandonment or betrayal and learn to love themselves as much as they love others. OC invites you to explore the issues of love, loyalty, trust and the company in your life, and to learn that true loyalty begins with oneself.
MayanSign.Chuen.interpretation: Chuen is the monkey, the teacher of the game, magic and divine illusion. It is the energy of creativity, spontaneity and humor. Chuen people are often artists, performers and jokes with an agile mind and a playful spirit. They have the ability to see life as a great game, to invent new things and find joy at the present time. They teach us not to take us too seriously. His challenge is not to be trapped in the superficiality of his own illusions and to use his immense intelligence constructively. Chuen invites you to play, to be creative, to find magic in everyday life and live life with a light heart.
MayanSign.Eb.interpretation: EB is the way, representing the trip of life, free will and abundance. It is the energy that guides us and reminds us that we are the pilots of our own destiny. EB people are often generous, workers and have a deep connection with nature and mother earth. They enjoy exploring, either physically or intellectually, and constantly seek ways of improving themselves and their community. His challenge is to choose his way with wisdom and not get lost in the options or expectations of others. EB invites you to walk your path with purpose and gratitude, recognizing that the trip itself is destiny.
MayanSign.Ben.interpretation: Ben is the cane, the hollow channel that serves as a pillar that connects the sky and earth. It is the seal of growth, family and time-time authority. Ben people are often born leaders, strong, determined and with a deep sense of their convictions and values. They are explorers of consciousness, always seeking to expand their horizons and tend bridges between different realities. His challenge is to stay flexible and not become too rigid or dogmatic in his beliefs. Ben invites you to stay firm in your truth while you remain open to new perspectives, thus becoming a channel for heavenly wisdom on earth.
MayanSign.Ix.interpretation: IX is the jaguar, the shaman and the magician who walks among the worlds. It represents magic, night vision, intuition and the power of the heart. IX people are often mysterious, sensitive, have a strong connection with nature and the spiritual world. They are the guardians of ancient wisdom and the sacred places. Its energy is that of the seer, which perceives the invisible. His challenge is to integrate his power responsible, honor his personal space and trust his inner vision. IX invites you to connect with your inner magic, to trust your intuition, sharpen your senses and walk around the world with an open and brave heart.
MayanSign.Men.interpretation: Men is the eagle, representing the superior vision, the collective mind and the planetary consciousness. It is the energy that allows us to see the general panorama and raise ourselves above worldly problems and dramas. Men people are often visionaries, independent thinkers and have an acute and analytical mind that allows them to see patterns and solutions that others overlook. His challenge is to learn to return to earth and connect with others at an emotional level, and not only intellectual, to avoid becoming too distant or critical. Men invites you to expand your vision, to believe in your highest dreams and share your unique perspective for the benefit of all.
MayanSign.Cib.interpretation: Cib is the vulture or owl, the guardian of ancient wisdom and cosmic memory. It represents the ability to receive and channel the divine guide and clean the old karmic patterns. CIB people are often serious, wise, conscientious and have a deep connection with the past and karma. They are excellent directors, capable of looking at complex problems with a higher perspective. His challenge is to forgive themselves and others, releasing the old loads to receive new wisdom. Cib invites you to quiet your mind, to listen to the soft voice of your inner consciousness and to honor the wisdom of your ancestors.
MayanSign.Caban.interpretation: Caban is the land, the energy of synchronicity, navigation and evolution. It is the force that aligns us with the pulse of the earth and guides us on our way, reminding us that we are never alone. Caban people are often progressive, mentally active and have a great sense of orientation. They are the ones who mark the rhythm of change and are often at the forefront of new ideas. His challenge is to remain anchored and not get carried away by mental overload or a constant need for stimulation. Caban invites you to pay attention to the signs and synchronicities that life presents to you, since they are the language with which the universe speaks to you.
MayanSign.Etznab.interpretation: Etznab is the flint, the mirror that reflects the truth without distortion. It is the energy of clarity, discernment and the ability to cut with what is not essential, illusions and self -deception. Etznab people are often brave, direct and have a sharp mind like a knife. They look for the truth without ornaments, even if it is uncomfortable. His challenge is to use his power of discernment with compassion, and not with judgment, since his words can hurt. Etznab invites you to look at you in the mirror of honest self -assessment and cut with any illusion that prevents you from seeing reality, and living your truth with integrity.
MayanSign.Cauac.interpretation: Cauc is the storm, the energy of purification, the deep transformation and the regeneration. It represents the rain that cleans the old, the ray that dissolves the structures and energy that nourishes the new life. Cauc people are often catalysts of change, youthful and full of indomitable energy. They bring an intensity that can be both destructive and incredibly healer. His challenge is to learn to channel his intense energy constructively, instead of being consumed by her. Cauac invites you to embrace change, allow emotional liberation and to be reborn from your own ashes, strengthened and renewed.
MayanSign.Ahau.interpretation: Ahau is the sun, the Lord, the energy of lighting, unconditional love and union with the divine source. It is the final seal, which represents the mastery and realization. Ahau people are often artists, leaders and dreamers who radiate special light and heat. Its purpose is to embody love, beauty and consciousness on earth. They are here to perform their maximum potential. His challenge is to overcome his own ego to be a true light channel, and not be trapped in the false pride or the need for recognition. Ahau invites you to connect with your inner sovereignty, to love unconditionally and celebrate the beauty of all creation.

GalacticTone.Magnetic.interpretation: The magnetic tone is the alpha, the starting point of all creation within the 13 -day cycle. It works as a powerful cosmic magnet, a center of gravity that attracts all the energies, resources, people and circumstances necessary for the manifestation of a new purpose. It represents the primary unit, inviting you to gather all the dispersed fragments of your will and focus them on a single and powerful intention. It is not a day for external action, but for internal attraction and clear definition. The key question is: 'What is my purpose?' Today, the universe asks you to feel silent, identify your deepest objective for this thirteen, and declare it with conviction. In doing so, you establish a vibratory frequency that will begin to attract everything you need for your trip.
GalacticTone.Lunar.interpretation: The lunar tone is that of polarity. Once you have defined your purpose with the magnetic tone, the moon tone presents the great challenge: the obstacle you must overcome, the duality that you must integrate. It works as a mirror, reflecting the opposite forces at stake: light and shade, support and resistance. It is not a negative energy; On the contrary, it is essential for growth. Without challenge, there is no movement. Stability is learning to walk on the tightrope between two poles. Today, the universe asks you: 'What is my challenge?' Identify the obstacles, doubts and relationships that test your purpose. By recognizing them not as enemies, but as teachers of balance, desire the strength and wisdom necessary to stabilize your path.
GalacticTone.Electric.interpretation: The electric tone is the first spark of action, the energy that activates and unites. After identifying the purpose (tone 1) and the challenge (tone 2), tone 3 drives you to create the link between them. It is the current that flows, weaving a network of connections and setting your resources in motion. Its keyword is 'service', because it asks you how your actions can serve not only for your purpose, but also to a greater good. It is time to build bridges, communicate, activate your support network and put your talents at the service of your goal. Today, the question is: 'How can I serve better?' Look for opportunities to collaborate, to share your gifts and to create synergies. Today's action is dynamic and connective.
GalacticTone.SelfExisting.interpretation: The self-existent tone brings energy and definition energy. Once the energy has been activated, this tone gives it a structure, a container. It is the architect of the cycle, who feels the bases, measures the parameters and defines the limits. He asks you to think about the most effective way for your action. What plan, what strategy, what structure do you need so that your purpose does not dispense? It is time to create order, to establish a framework and give a tangible form to your ideas. Today, the question is: 'What is the form of my action?' Define your plans, organize your steps and create a clear map. The stability of your project depends on the foundations you build today.
GalacticTone.Overtone.interpretation: The tone is the radiant center of power. Once you have a structure, this tone asks you to gather all your resources and put them in command. It is time to take control, to empower yourself and to radiate your authority from the center of your being. It is not about power over others, but about the power to manage your own skills and talents with mastery. It is the command tower from which you run your project. Today, the question is: 'How can I empower myself?' Gather your tools, recognize your strengths and take the reins. Irradia trust and certainty in your purpose. It is a day to shine and lead from your nucleus.
GalacticTone.Rhythmic.interpretation: The rhythmic tone introduces the concept of balance in motion. After taking power, this tone teaches you to apply it with rhythm and fluidity. It is about organizing your actions to flow in an organic and balanced way, adapting to the challenges without losing your center. It is like a dance: it requires structure, but also grace and response capacity. The keyword is 'equality', since it asks you to balancing all aspects of your life: work and rest, give and receive, action and introspection. Today, the question is: 'How do I organize for equality?' Find your natural rhythm, don't force things. Organize your day in a way that nourishes you and keeps you in a constant and harmonious flow.
GalacticTone.Resonant.interpretation: The resonant tone is the midpoint of the thirteen, the central channel that connects you directly to the source of inspiration. It is the energy of the tuning, how to adjust a radio antenna to receive a clear signal. This tone invites you to stop, silence outside noise and listen to the wisdom that emanates from your interior and the universe. It is not an action day, but of reception. Today, the question is: 'How can I tune in my service with others?' Meditate, walk in nature, pay attention to synchronicities. Allow yourself to be a channel for divine inspiration, letting energy flow through you and guide you towards the following steps of your purpose.
GalacticTone.Galactic.interpretation: The galactic tone is that of integrity, which asks if you really 'walk your word'. After receiving inspiration (tone 7), this tone challenges you to live in harmony with that truth. It is a coherence exam: Are your actions, words and thoughts aligned with your deepest beliefs? It invites you to model your truth, to be a living example of your values. Today, the question is: 'I live what I believe?' Look at your life and look for any area in which you are not being authentic. It is a day to adjust your behavior and make sure that every step you take is in perfect harmony with your ethical and spiritual code.
GalacticTone.Solar.interpretation: The solar tone is the pulse of intention, the energy it performs and materializes. With your confirmed integrity, now it is time to act with a clear and focused intention. It is like the sun ray that crosses the clouds to touch a specific point on Earth. This tone gives you strength to take the decisive steps that will bring your purpose to the manifestation. Today, the question is: 'How do I get my purpose?' It is not about any action, but about the precise and deliberate action that brings you closer to your goal. Identify the next key step and execute it with all your will and conviction.
GalacticTone.Planetary.interpretation: The planetary tone is that of manifestation and perfection. This is where your intentions and actions become visible in the physical world. It is the moment of harvest, to see the tangible result of your work. But it's not just about producing, but about perfecting. This tone invites you to observe what you have created and make the final adjustments so that it is perfectly align with your original vision. Today, the question is: 'How do I perfect what I do?' Look at your creation, be it a project, an internal relationship or change, and polish the details. It is time to express excellence.
GalacticTone.Spectral.interpretation: The spectral tone brings the energy of liberation and dissolution. After manifesting (tone 10), this tone asks you to release everything that is not essential, all excess emotional, mental or physical luggage that you have accumulated in the process. It is a catharsis energy, deep cleaning. As a snake that moves skin, you must free yourself from the old structures and beliefs to continue growing. Today, the question is: 'How do I free and let go?' Identify what weighs you, what limits you, and make a conscious act of releasing it, creating space and lightness for the next cycle.
GalacticTone.Crystal.interpretation: The crystal tone is that of cooperation and community. Once you have freed yourself from the unnecessary, you are ready to share your wisdom and your achievements with others. This tone represents the 'round table', where all points of view are valid and collaboration creates a more complex and stable structure than what you could create alone. It is the energy of synergy, to universalize your purpose to benefit the collective. Today, the question is: 'How can I dedicate myself to cooperation?' Look for ways to share what you have learned, to collaborate with others and to understand how your personal trip fits the fabric of the community.
GalacticTone.Cosmic.interpretation: The cosmic tone is the final flight, which transcends the current cycle and prepares for the next. It represents the pure presence and the ability to last over time. Having completed the 12 -step trip, now you can take your place in the cosmos, present and expanded. It is a day to celebrate your trip, to integrate everything you have learned, and to expand your joy and your love without limits. Today, the question is: 'How do I expand my joy and my love?' Live in the magic of the present moment, knowing that you have completed a cycle and you are ready for the next. It is the energy of return home and simultaneous takeoff.

DreamWizard.step1.title: Describe your dream
DreamWizard.step1.description: Tell the main story of your dream with the greatest possible detail.
DreamWizard.step1.placeholder: I was in a dark forest and suddenly I started flying over a city of clouds ...
DreamWizard.step2.title: People or beings
DreamWizard.step2.description: Who appeared in your dream? (eg, family, strangers, animals that speak)
DreamWizard.step2.placeholder: My mother, an old friend, a fox who guided me ...
DreamWizard.step3.title: Places and scenarios
DreamWizard.step3.description: Where did the dream take place? (Ex: Childhood House, an unknown place, space)
DreamWizard.step3.placeholder: On a black sand beach, inside a glass castle ...
DreamWizard.step4.title: Dominant emotions
DreamWizard.step4.description: What emotions did you feel stronger during sleep?
DreamWizard.step4.placeholder: Joy, fear, confusion, a feeling of peace ...
DreamWizard.step5.title: Symbols and objects
DreamWizard.step5.description: Were there objects, colors or symbols that were repeated or highlighted?
DreamWizard.step5.placeholder: A golden key, a standing watch, water everywhere ...
DreamWizard.step6.title: Sleep intensity
DreamWizard.step6.description: How vivid or intense was your dream?
DreamWizard.loadingMessage: The spirits are analyzing the symbols and emotions of your trip ...
DreamWizard.error.coreRequired: The main description of the dream is mandatory.
